subject: fix: suppress OneSignal auto-prompt slidedown
body:
OneSignal SDK was auto-showing its "subscribe to news and updates"
slidedown prompt independently of our Settings modal. Added autoPrompt
and autoRegister flags to suppress it in both init locations.

https://claude.ai/code/session_018NrJiMtPGf7KmYUgKG9yCq
title: suppress OneSignal auto-prompt slidedown
